General.Name: Chi Sheng Chemical
General.Description: Chi Sheng Pharma & Biotech Co., Ltd manufactures and distributes medical medicines and equipment in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include antibiotics and chemotherapeutic agents; plasma substitutes and amino acid preparations; water nutrients and electrolyte preparations; vitamins; hepatotropic agents; hormones and adrenal cortical steroids; autonomic nerves agents; antihistamines and antipruritics; antipyretics and analgesics; antitussives and anti-asthmas; gastro-intestinal preparations; local anesthetic preparations; hemodialysis concentrate and external solutions; peritoneal dialysis solutions; and others. The company also offers medical devices, fat emulsion products, anesthetic products, hemostatics solutions, food products, health foods, functional drinks, skin care products, cosmetics, and veterinary medicinal products. In addition, it offers externally applied medicines, including contact lens, salt, and iodine solutions. Chi Sheng Pharma & Biotech Co., Ltd was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Hsin Chu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Shih Chen Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30352
